name.zh_CN: Amazing Screenshot 截图和标注工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture screenshot of web page easily and conveniently, and the powerful graffiti allows you to edit screenshot as you like
short.es: Capture capturas de pantalla de páginas web de manera fácil y conveniente, y la poderosa función de graffiti le permite editar…
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Capture capturas de tela de páginas da Web de maneira fácil e conveniente, e a poderosa função de grafite permite que você edite as…
short.zh_CN: 轻松方便捕捉网页截图，强大的涂鸦功能让你随心所欲编辑截图

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazing Screenshot screenshot and annotation tool is a simple, free screenshot capture extension that allows you to easily implement screenshots and annotation functions with just one click.

Meet the requirements of high-quality, high-resolution screenshots, support PNG, JPG, PDF formats, built-in rich annotation tools, allowing you to easily edit screenshots, and you can also use it as a graffiti tool to edit web content at will .

✍Screenshot function:
☑︎ Screenshots of some areas
☑︎ Screenshot of the entire page
☑︎ Screenshot of the visible area
☑︎ Support saving screenshots in PNG, JPG, and PDF formats.
☑︎ Screen capture keyboard shortcuts


✍Screen shot annotation function:
☑︎ write text
☑︎ Obfuscate sensitive information
☑︎ Use arrows and stickers
☑︎ Include rectangular boxes or lines
☑︎ Picture cropping
☑︎ Insert picture
☑︎ Support saving screenshots in PNG, JPG, and PDF formats.

privacy:
We will not collect, store, use, transfer or sell your personal privacy information.
long.zh_CN:
Amazing Screenshot截图和标注工具是一个简单、免费的屏幕截图捕获扩展，使您只需单击一下即可轻松实现截图和标注功能。

满足高质量，高分辨率屏幕截图需求，支持PNG，JPG，PDF格式，内置丰富的标注工具，让你轻松对截图进行编辑，另外你也可以把它当作涂鸦工具，对网页内容进行任意编辑。

✍截图功能：
☑︎部分区域截图
☑︎整个页面截图
☑︎可视区域截图
☑︎支持将屏幕截图保存为PNG，JPG，PDF格式。
☑︎屏幕捕捉键盘快捷键

✍屏幕截图标注功能：
☑︎写文字
☑︎模糊敏感信息
☑︎使用箭头和贴纸
☑︎包括矩形框或线条
☑︎图片剪裁
☑︎插入图片
☑︎支持将屏幕截图保存为PNG，JPG，PDF格式。

隐私：
我们不会收集，存储，使用，转移或出售您的个人隐私信息。
